name: Tuggy's Revolt
description:
A student work for a game projet. The game project "Tuggy's Revolt".

You play Tuggy, a cow owner of a farm, Tuggy's Farm. While the world is controlled by Nazi pigs, the leader of pigs, Otto Von Pigger, sends these henchmen, kamikaze pig to deport Tuggy in order to make bifteck for sale in a fast food.

Help Tuggy lead a revolt.
